verbose_text: Izumiya et al demonstrated that the treatment of ApoE - deficient mice on an atherogenic diet for 8 weeks with nicorandil significantly reduced atherosclerotic lesions and plaque necrosis.
evidence: al               demonstrated that the treatment of ApoE -  deficient mice on an atherogenic diet for 8 weeks with nicorandil significantly reduced atherosclerotic lesions and plaque necrosis
